data.name: XExtendedIndexEntrySupplier
desc: This interface provides information for creating \"Table of Index\".
It is derived from com.sun.star.i18n.XIndexEntrySupplier and provides following additional functionalities.

methods.name: compareIndexEntry
desc: Note that loadAlgorithm should be called before calling this function.

methods.name: getAlgorithmList
desc: Returns index algorithm list for specific locale.

methods.name: getIndexKey
desc: Note that loadAlgorithm should be called before calling this function.

methods.name: getLocaleList
desc: Returns locale list for which the IndexEntrySupplier provides service.

methods.name: getPhoneticCandidate
desc: Returns phonetic candidate for index entry for the locale.

methods.name: loadAlgorithm
desc: Loads index algorithm for the locale.

methods.name: usePhoneticEntry
desc: Checks if Phonetic Entry should be used for the locale.
